abstract: Modifies this view by injecting a value that you provide for use by other views whose state depends on the focused scene.

declaration.code: nonisolated func focusedSceneValue<T>(_ keyPath: WritableKeyPath<FocusedValues, T?>, _ value: T) -> some View

overview:
## Return Value

A modified representation of this view.

## Discussion

Use this method instead of [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/focusedValue(_:_:)] for values that must be visible regardless of where focus is located in the active scene. For example, if an app needs a command for moving focus to a particular text field in the sidebar, it could use this modifier to publish a button action that’s visible to command views as long as the scene is active, and regardless of where focus happens to be in it.
